code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./animalsSection.css';import{fetchData}from'../../Api/dataApi';import{useTranslation}from'react-i18next';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AnimalsSection=()=>{const{t}=useTranslation();const[Animals,setAnimals]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchAnimals=async()=>{try{const result=await fetchData('Animals');setAnimals(result);}catch(err){setError(err.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchAnimals();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Animal-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:t('All in Animal')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"section-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/Animal",className:"see-more",children:[t('See More')," ",'>']})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Animal-grid",children:[loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:t('Loading...')}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:"red"},children:error}),Animals.map(Animal=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Animal-card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(Animal.id||Animal._id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Array.isArray(Animal.images)&&Animal.images.length>0?Animal.images[0]:'default-image-url.jpg',alt:Animal.title||t('No Name'),className:"Animal-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Animal-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:Animal.title||t('No Name')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"Animal-description",children:Animal.description||t('No Description')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"Animal-price",children:[t('Price'),": ",Animal.price||t('No Price')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"Animal-location",children:[t('Location'),": ",Animal.location||t('No Location')]})]})]})},Animal.id||Animal._id))]})]});};export default AnimalsSection;
